content.rendered:
A film crew arrives at a secluded ranch in Texas to make an adult film. Their hosts, a reclusive elderly couple, show a special interest in their young guests. As night falls, the pair’s interest turns violent.

Directed By Ti West

Written By Ti West

Stars: Mia Goth. Jenna Ortega. Brittany Snow
